Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Cambados (Rias Baixas), San Marcos is convenient to Ethnographic and Wine Museum and Church of Santa Marina Dozo. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of San Sadurnino Tower and Fefinanes Palace Winery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 61 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include phones and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional features include concierge services, an arcade/game room, and a hair salon.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of San Marcos. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of San Marcos. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Cambados (Rias Baixas), San Marcos is convenient to Ethnographic and Wine Museum and Church of Santa Marina Dozo. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of San Sadurnino Tower and Fefinanes Palace Winery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ethnographic and Wine Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Church of Santa Marina Dozo - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
San Sadurnino Tower - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Fefinanes Palace Winery - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Martin Codax Winery - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Praza de Fefinans - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Gil Armada Winery - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Church of San Sebastian - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Mar De Frades Winery - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Paseo Maritimo - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Granbazan Winery - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Familia Mariscadora Monument - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Church of San Martino - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Santiago Roma Winery - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Monastery of Santa Maria in Armenteira - 6.4 km / 4 mi

The preferred airport for San Marcos is Vigo (VGO-Peinador) - 33.5 km / 20.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
